http://www.t-dose.org/

T-Dose 2016, From UNIX to Linux, a time lapse of 45 years, Hendrik Jan Thomassen. 

Paper: 

Looking back 45 years from Linux to UNIX in The Netherlands. A shorter version of this talk was presented at last years Social Event. It was a big success and many requested to schedule it for this years T-DOSE.
title: From UNIX to Linux, a time lapse of 45 years
